SEC: All employers that employ employees (Singapore Citizens) aged 60 years and above, earning a monthly wage of up to $4,000 and have made timely mandatory CPF contributions for the employee will qualify for the payout for 2023 to 2025.
EEC: All employers that employ persons with disabilities (Singapore Citizens and Permanent Residents) aged 13 and above, earning a monthly wage of below $4,000 and have made timely mandatory CPF contributions for the employee will qualify for the payout.
CTO: All employers that employ local employees (Singapore Citizens and Permanent Residents) aged above 55 to 70 and have made timely mandatory CPF contributions for the employee will qualify for the payout.
